name: Classic Margherita Pizza
description: A thin, crispy crust layered with tangy tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and fragrant basil leaves, drizzled with olive oil for an authentic Italian taste.

name: Vegan Buddha Bowl
description: A colorful mix of quinoa, roasted chickpeas, sweet potatoes, avocado, and fresh greens, served with a tahini dressing for a hearty, nutrient-packed meal.

name: Berry Acai Smoothie Bowl
description: A refreshing blend of acai berries, bananas, and almond milk, topped with granola, coconut flakes, and fresh berries for a vibrant and healthy breakfast.

name: Spicy Chicken Tacos
description: Soft tortillas filled with seasoned grilled chicken, topped with fresh salsa, creamy avocado, and a zesty lime-cilantro sauce.

name: Beef Ramen Noodle Bowl
description: Savory beef broth filled with tender beef slices, chewy ramen noodles, mushrooms, and a soft-boiled egg, garnished with green onions and nori.
